verses.name: Joel 2:3
verses.text: A fire devoureth before them; and behind them a flame burneth: the land is as the garden of Eden before them, and behind them a desolate wilderness; yea, and nothing shall escape them.

verses.name: Joel 2:4
verses.text: The appearance of them is as the appearance of horses; and as horsemen, so shall they run.

verses.name: Joel 2:5
verses.text: Like the noise of chariots on the tops of mountains shall they leap, like the noise of a flame of fire that devoureth the stubble, as a strong people set in battle array.

verses.name: Joel 2:6
verses.text: Before their face the people shall be much pained: all faces shall gather blackness.
